comments:
Description:
Create a web project, and run on local server. Use the attached jsp file, and run the jsp file on web browser, fail to render chart in the report. 
The location of machine is chinese, and set the locale of "Window->preference->report design->preview" as english.

Preview the report design in BIRT layout, works fine.

Build version:2.2.0.v20070605-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create web project "wtp2", run on local server.
2. Use the attached jsp file, and type the "http://localhost:port/wtp2/test.jsp" in the internal browser. 

Error log:
The following items have errors:
